name: Idle Mage
description:
Idle Mage is a role playing idle game where you can fulfill your dreams of becoming a mage.
Choose From 40+ different Job profession:-
Pyromancer
Hydromancer
Geomancer
Necromancer
And many more.

10+ Elements to choose from, what will be your element.
Acquire powerful weapons.
Tame cute pets.
Defeat the evil demons and save the world.
Idle Mage is a Role Plying Sandbox Idle Game where you can just be idle and make a lot of progress. Even if you are offline you can progress. Compete with everyone in the global leader board to be number 1.
